import React from 'react'; import './App.scss'; import { offers } from './constants'; import rocketImg from './img/rocket.svg'; import bgImg from './img/Rectangle39610.png'; export default function App() { const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = React.useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen((v) => !v); const closeMenu = () => setMenuOpen(false); const heroBackground = [ 'radial-gradient(1200px 500px at 80% -200px, rgba(97, 218, 251, 0.2), transparent 60%)', 'linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.02), rgba(255, 255, 255, 0))', `url(${bgImg})`, ].join(', '); return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Hero */}

Заголовок из макета

Короткий подзаголовок/описание. Точные тексты и размеры возьму из Figma.

Offers

Where the possibilities are endless!

{offer.title}

{offer.description}

))}

Embark on a space journey

Travelling into space is one of the most exciting and unforgettable adventures that can change your life forever. Our experienced team allows you to go on a space journey and see the world the way few have. We guarantee safety, comfort, and incredible impressions while you enjoy every moment beyond the atmosphere. We offer various options for space excursions so that you can fully enjoy your adventure among the stars.

Read more
{/* Footer */}
Exciting space adventure!
